body:
Show us your best defenses made on any map on Avicus! Just post the name of the map, and the picture of your defense. I'll go first.

This one I built just now. The defense held well, except some other people on my tam covered the monument and made it easier for the other team to hid and mine it. It was on Campi Erbosi.

title: Show us your BEST defense!

replies.body: I was playing against you in that game, your defense is obviously OP as nobody could get through it until we all went at once :P
replies.body_tagged: I was playing against you in that game, your defense is obviously OP as nobody could get through it until we all went at once :P

replies.body: Yea I tried to shoot you all down when you jumped on the monument, but some guy on my team made a base on it, so it was impossible. But thx!

replies.body: What's defence? I'm not into that stuff
replies.body_tagged: What's defence? I'm not into that stuff

replies.body:
It's that thing you do to NOT allow the other team to win........like you know defending? LOL

I noticed that though, not a lot of people defend here on Avicus as much as they do on Overcast. On Avicus it's more about the objectives I guess. So I try to do my part and make it easier for my team to win by defending the monument a bit
